alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 22 at 2:49AM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING BELOW 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. Wind gusts decreasing to 30 to 40 mph by late afternoon. * WHERE...Lower elevations of Gila County. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will develop behind a cold front today, causing areas of blowing snow and poor visibility..
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
